content.value: SELECT T1.ID, CONCAT(T1.NAME, '/', T1.AUTHOR) AS TITLE, T1.DISCOUNT_PRICE, T1.IMG, T2.COLLEGE AS POSITION FROM TBL_XS_BOOKS T1 LEFT JOIN TBL_XS_USERS T2 ON T1.`OWNER`=T2.ID WHERE 1=1 <#if keyWords?? > AND T1.NAME LIKE '%${keyWords}%' OR T1.AUTHOR LIKE '%${keyWords}%' </#if> <#if orderBy?? > ORDER BY ${orderBy} </#if> <#if start?? && limit?? > LIMIT ${start!'0'}, ${limit} </#if>

SELECT ID, CONCAT(NAME, '/', AUTHOR) AS TITLE, DISCOUNT_PRICE, NEW_DEGREE, IMG, POSITION FROM TBL_XS_BOOKS WHERE 1=1 <#if keyWords?? > AND NAME LIKE '%${keyWords}%' OR AUTHOR LIKE '%${keyWords}%' </#if> <#if orderBy?? > ORDER BY ${orderBy} </#if> <#if start?? && limit?? > LIMIT ${start!'0'}, ${limit} </#if>
